hanzi-su-wiki:
論

Значения

Спор; мнение, взгляд; рассуждать, трактовать; суждение

Мнемоника

Весомость речи 言 определяется знанием 侖 вопроса.

Варианты

论
purpleculture_pinyin:
lùn
opinion; view; theory; doctrine; to discuss; to talk about; to regard; to consider; per; by the (kilometer, hour etc)
мнение; Посмотреть; теория; доктрина; обсуждать; говорить о; в отношении; учитывать; за; по (километр, час и т. д.)

lún
abbr. for 论语 , The Analects (of Confucius)
сокр. для 论语, Аналекты (Конфуция)

(Simplified: 论)

purpleculture_tree:

    • 侖 [ lún ] logical reasons, logical order
heisig_chinese_memo: Arguments about theorys at academic conferences are naturally carried out using words.
heisig_constituent: argument, say, words, keitai, mouth, post-it note, meeting, scrapbook, glass canopy, hood, flowers
heisig_story: Words . . . meeting . . . scrapbook. The argument here is a process of academic reasoning, not a personal quarrel or spat.
koohiiStory1: Right part: academic conference (a meeting, some of the attendees making notes in scrapbooks during presentation). Argument at academic conferences is naturally carried out using words.
koohiiStory2: It´s very difficult to present a good argument if you don´t bring along a scrapbook with some key words jotted down to the meeting.
jp_example_words:
異論(いろん): different opinion, objection
言論(げんろん): discussion
世論(せろん): public opinion
討論(とうろん): debate, discussion
弁論(べんろん): discussion, debate, argument
無論(むろん): of course, naturally
目論見(もくろみ): a plan, a scheme, a project, a program, intention, goal
理論(りろん): theory
論議(ろんぎ): discussion
論理(ろんり): logic
概論(がいろん): introduction, outline, general remarks
議論(ぎろん): argument, discussion, dispute
結論(けつろん): reason, sum up, conclude
評論(ひょうろん): criticism, critique
勿論(もちろん): of course, certainly, naturally
論じる(ろんじる): argue, discuss, debate
論ずる(ろんずる): argue, discuss, debate
論争(ろんそう): controversy, dispute
論文(ろんぶん): thesis, essay, treatise, paper
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You say, throwing your hat on the ground in front of the bookshelf, "I have a theory!" All this reading and thinking has finally given you a wonderful idea, a theory you think might solve all of your problems!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: This theory you've thought of is great, it's going to change everything!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: "What is your theory, Ron (ろん)?" asks Hermione. You're Ron Weasley, and you just came up with a theory that you think will help you stop Voldemort.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: "Ron? Ron, what's your theory? What's your theory, Ron?" Hermione asks over and over. But you freeze. You don't remember who you are. "Hermione, I have a theory that I was just a person learning Japanese, and not a magical boy at all." "Shut up Ron, that's a stupid theory," she replies.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 冊 (том), 言 (слово)
Ru_trainchinese:
lùn: (предлог) в соответствии с, по, на
lùn: (графема) обсуждать, спорить; определять; теория; мнение, утверждение; трактат (используется в названиях)
lún: (графема) (сокр.) Аналекты Конфуция
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the thinking (侖) words (言) are your thesis
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The lifeguard preaches a theory of pool safety to the children but they listen to nothing he says.
origin_of_ch_char_book: Woman writing with a brush pen (18th–19th century) In modern China, this is the character that is used to signify reading a book: (書, 书, shu, book) On the top there is a hand, and underneath the character is the bottom of the tree (本, ben, root). Like the stump of a tree, a person holds a long, stubby pen tool. Below is a fire (火, huo, fire) burning for the ancestral rite, and a mouth that means words at the rite. This character describes someone recording the words of various people performing at the memorial service. It is now used to mean a book. (論, 论, lun, essay; discuss) The left symbolizes a forthright statement like a spear (言, yan, speak). Upper right corner is a roof or lid that collects something in it. And there are wood pieces with various records tied up together . The ancients have written a lot of records on bamboo sticks, and they discuss together whether these records are right or wrong. Therefore, this character has become to mean logical theory or a rational discussion.

origin_of_ch_char_book: Woman writing with a brush pen (18th–19th century)In modern China, this is the character that is used to signify reading a book: (書, 书, shu, book) On the top there is a hand, and underneath the character is the bottom of the tree (本, ben, root). Like the stump of a tree, a person holds a long, stubby pen tool. Below is a fire (火, huo, fire) burning for the ancestral rite, and a mouth that means words at the rite. This character describes someone recording the words of various people performing at the memorial service. It is now used to mean a book. (論, 论, lun, essay; discuss) The left symbolizes a forthright statement like a spear (言, yan, speak). Upper right corner is a roof or lid that collects something in it. And there are wood pieces with various records tied up together . The ancients have written a lot of records on bamboo sticks, and they discuss together whether these records are right or wrong. Therefore, this character has become to mean logical theory or a rational discussion.

①分析判斷事物的道理：論斷。論點。論辯。論據。論者。議論。討論。辯論。
②分析闡明事物道理的文章、理論和言論：理論。輿論。專論。社論。
③學說，有系統的主張：系統論。
④看待：一概而論。
⑤衡量，評定：論罪。論功行賞。
⑥按照：論件。論資排輩。
⑦姓氏。
①古同“倫”，條理。
②(論語)中國古書名，內容主要是記載孔子及其門人的言行。
③古同“掄”，挑選。

論字的基本解释

論
lùn

論
lún
均见“论”。

論字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lùn］
［《廣韻》盧困切，去慁，來。］
［《廣韻》盧昆切，平魂，來。］
“论1”的繁体字。
(1)议论；分析和说明事理。
(2)衡量；评定。
(3)编次。
(4)研究。
(5)调查。
(6)推知。
(7)问，考虑。
(8)定罪。
(9)论告；弹劾。
(10)谓按照某种单位或类别等。
(11)叙说；说。
(12)言论；舆论。
(13)主张；学说；观点。
(14)相貌。
(15)凭借；倚仗。
(16)古代的一种气球。是游戏、运动用具。
(17)文体的一种。即议论文。
(18)泛指文章。
(19)佛教解释经义、论辩法相的书籍。梵名阿毗达摩，意为“對法”。同经、律合称“三藏”。
(20)吐蕃大臣的称号。又称论逋。例由贵族担任。后西藏仍沿用此称。
(21)姓。唐代有论钦陵。见唐林宝《元和姓纂》卷九。
[②]［lún］
［《廣韻》盧昆切，平魂，來。］
［《廣韻》力迍切，平諄，來。］
“论2”的繁体字。
(1)《论语》

論字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　論； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1168第13
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?盧昆切，音崘。【說文】議也。【廣韻】說也。【周禮·春官·大司樂·賈疏】直言曰論，答難曰語。論者，語中之別，與言不同。又【論語·序解正義】論者，綸也，輪也，理也，次也，撰也。以此書可經綸世務，故曰綸，圓轉無窮故曰輪，蘊含萬理故曰理，篇章有序故曰次，羣賢集定故曰撰。【文心雕龍】昔仲尼微言，門人追述，故仰其經目，稱爲論語，蓋羣論立名，始于兹矣。　又【釋名】倫也，有倫理也。【玉篇】思理也。【詩·大雅】於論鼓鐘。【傳】思也。【鄭箋】論之言倫也。【朱傳】言得其倫理也。　又【增韻】紬繹討論也。【孔安國·尚書序】討論典墳。　又【正韻】決罪曰論。　又官名。【金史·百官志】其官長皆稱曰勃極烈，次曰國論、忽魯、勃極烈。國論，言貴。忽魯，猶總帥也。　又諸羌州名。【唐書·地理志】劒南道有論川州，開元後置。　又姓。【唐書】論弓仁，本吐蕃族也。又三字姓。【金史·國語解·姓氏】烏古論曰商。　又【廣韻】力迍切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】龍春切，?音

s
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lùn］
["Guangyun" Lu Kunqie, go and come. ]
["Guangyun" Lu Kunqie, Ping Hun, come. ]
Traditional characters of "论1".
(1) Discussion; analysis and explanation.
(2) Measurement; evaluation.
(3) Number of times.
(4) Research.
(5) Investigation.
(6) Inference.
(7) Ask, consider.
(8) Conviction.
(9) Discuss; impeachment.
(10) According to a certain unit or category, etc.
(11) Narrative; speak.
(12) Speech; public opinion.
(13) Advocates; doctrines; viewpoints.
(14) Appearance.
(15) Rely on; rely on.
(16) An ancient balloon. It is games and sports equipment.
(17) A type of style. Discussed essay.
(18) Refers to articles in general.
(19) Books on Buddhism interpreting scriptures and arguments. The Sanskrit name Abhidhamma means "dhamma". The same sutra and law are collectively called "San Zang".
(20) The title of Minister of Tubo. Also known as Lunbu. The case was held by the nobles. Later Tibet still used this name.
(21) Last name. There is a discussion about Qin Ling in the Tang Dynasty. See Volume 9 of Tang Linbao's "Compilation of Yuanhe Surnames".
[②]［lún］
["Guangyun" Lu Kunqie, Ping Hun, come. ]
["Guangyun" forcefully cut, smooth, come. ]
Traditional characters of "论2".
(1) "The Analects"

[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　On; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1168 No. 13
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Lu Kunqie, Yinwei. [Said Wen] Ye Ye. [Guang Yun] Say it. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Da Si Le·Jia Shu】Speaking bluntly and speaking, and answering difficult questions. On the argument, the difference in language is different from the language. Also [The Analects of Confucius] Theorists, Lun Ye, Lun Ye, Li Ye, Ci Ye, Zhuan Ye. This book can be used to manage the affairs of the world, so it is called Lun, when the circle is endless, it is called the wheel, contains all the principles and the reason, the order of the chapters is called the second, and the collection of talents is called the essay. [Wen Xin Diao Long] Xizhong Nie Weiyan, the disciple recounted, so he looked up his scriptures, called the Analects of Confucius, the name of the group discussion, began with this.　[Release name] Ethics and ethics. 【Jade articles】Si Li also. 【Poetry·Daya】On the drum bell. 【Biography】Thinking too. [Zheng Jian] The ethics of the argument is also. [Zhu Chuan] Words are ethical.　 [Zeng Yun] The discussion is also on the Yi Yi. [Kong Anguo·Shangshu Preface] Discuss Dianfen.　[Zhengyun] The conviction is called on.　Also official name. [Jin Shi·Hundred Officials] All the officials called Bo Ji Lie, followed by Guo Lun, Hu Lu, and Bo Ji Lie. State theory is expensive. Hulu, Commander-in-Chief Yu also.　Zhu Qiangzhou's name. [Book of Tang·Geography] There is a discussion on Chuanzhou in South Road, and it is placed after Kaiyuan.　Another last name. [Book of Tang] On Gongren, this Tubo is also. Another three-character surname. 【Golden History·Mandarin Explanation·Surname】Ugu Lun said Shang.　[Guangyun] Li Yingqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Long Chunqie,? Yin

Name meaning

lùn, lún
вм. 论
Radicals: 言, 一, 冊  (say, ground, bookshelf, hat)
Meaning Mnemonic
You say, throwing your hat on the ground in front of the bookshelf, "I have a theory!" All this reading and thinking has finally given you a wonderful idea, a theory you think might solve all of your problems!
This theory you've thought of is great, it's going to change everything!
Reading Mnemonic
"What is your theory, Ron (ろん)?" asks Hermione. You're Ron Weasley, and you just came up with a theory that you think will help you stop Voldemort.
"Ron? Ron, what's your theory? What's your theory, Ron?" Hermione asks over and over. But you freeze. You don't remember who you are. "Hermione, I have a theory that I was just a person learning Japanese, and not a magical boy at all." "Shut up Ron, that's a stupid theory," she replies.
